Description: Ribbed red ware pottery ostracon containing a letter.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (271-275, pl.38)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82901) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82901)
